create-user.help: Create an authorized user for the web frontend

create-views.help: Recreate views only (without building rest of schema)

db-migration.help: Command to generate a basic migration.

plugins.help: Print a list of enabled plugins

reset-password.help: Reset the password for an existing user

shell.help: Get a Python shell within the application

show-interface.help: Show the import interface for a database model.

validate-data.help: Try to import data into the database to see if errors are raised.
